remoteServer

Interface Calculator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComputingMachine

    public interface Calculator
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This inteface encapsulates the public behaviour of a Calculator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Float[] findRoots(java.lang.Integer[] coefficients)
      Find the roots of a polynomial of n grade, n being the length of the array coefficients minus 1.
      java.lang.Integer multiply(java.lang.Integer a, java.lang.Integer b)
      This operation multiplies two integers.
      java.lang.Integer substract(java.lang.Integer a, java.lang.Integer b)
      This operation substracts the second integer from the first one.
      java.lang.Integer sum(java.lang.Integer a, java.lang.Integer b)
      This operation sums two integers.

    • Method Detail

      • sum

        java.lang.Integer sum(java.lang.Integer a,
                      java.lang.Integer b)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This operation sums two integers.
        Parameters:
        a - First integer
        b - Second integer
        Returns:
        The sum of both
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if somethig goes wrong in the connection

      • substract

        java.lang.Integer substract(java.lang.Integer a,
                            java.lang.Integer b)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This operation substracts the second integer from the first one.
        Parameters:
        a - First integer
        b - Second integer
        Returns:
        The first integer minus the second one.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if somethig goes wrong in the connection

      • multiply

        java.lang.Integer multiply(java.lang.Integer a,
                           java.lang.Integer b)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This operation multiplies two integers.
        Parameters:
        a - First integer
        b - Second integer
        Returns:
        The product of both integers
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if somethig goes wrong in the connection

      • findRoots

        java.lang.Float[] findRoots(java.lang.Integer[] coefficients)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Find the roots of a polynomial of n grade, n being the length of the array coefficients minus 1.
        Parameters:
        coefficients - Vector of the coefficients of the polynomial
        Returns:
        An array of reals with the polynomials
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if somethig goes wrong in the connection
